languages.text: "Разумеется, Ваша Светлость. Ущерб будет вам компенсирован" {n}— кивает губернатор без особого энтузиазма.{/n}
"Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for the damages." {n}The governor nods without any enthusiasm.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Разумеется, Ваша Светлость. Ущерб будет вам компенсирован" {n}— кивает губернатор без особого энтузиазма.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for your damage," {n}the governor nods with no great enthusiasm.{/n}

languages.text: "Natürlich, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Ihr werdet entschädigt." {n}Der Gouverneur nickt ohne jeden Eifer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for the damages." {n}The governor nods without any enthusiasm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Ihr werdet entschädigt." {n}Der Gouverneur nickt ohne jeden Eifer.{/n}

languages.text: « Naturellement, Votre Seigneurie. Vous recevrez une compensation pour les dégâts subis, » {n}approuve le gouverneur sans enthousiasme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for the damages." {n}The governor nods without any enthusiasm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Naturellement, Votre Seigneurie. Vous recevrez une compensation pour les dégâts subis, » {n}approuve le gouverneur sans enthousiasme.{/n}

languages.text: “当然，大人，您会得到补偿的。”{n}总督冷淡地点点头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for the damages." {n}The governor nods without any enthusiasm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “当然，大人，您会得到补偿的。”{n}总督冷淡地点点头。{/n}

languages.text: 「もちろんだ、陛下。損害は補償させていただく」{n}総督は熱意なくうなずく。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for the damages." {n}The governor nods without any enthusiasm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんだ、陛下。損害は補償させていただく」{n}総督は熱意なくうなずく。{/n}

languages.text: «Por supuesto, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Se le indemnizará por los daños». {n}El gobernador asiente sin entusiasmo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for the damages." {n}The governor nods without any enthusiasm.{/n}

languages.text: "Elbette {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Hasarınız tazmin edilecektir." {n}Vali, başıyla şevksizce onaylıyor.{/n}
